I have recently downloaded and watched "The Eternal Jew". Of course it is blood-chillingly wrong and inhuman as a movie, but there is something these movies still have to offer: we should ask ourselves, are the same propaganda tools are still in use? Just look at the portrail of etnic and religious minorities in Europe on printed and visual media, especially Muslims. People should be aware the power of images and pseudo-scientific claims in disguise of serious documentaries and news programs. One should put himself in the shoes of an ordinary "aryan" european growing up watching these pieces of sh*t and realize how comformity with what the authorities (public or private) want us to believe can lead to human tragedies, and more importantly how easy it is to believe that people are so inherently different, and peaceful solutions to problems are impossible. 
Jews of the world had to pay 5.5 million lives to overcome the prejudice against them embedded in the western civilization. The rest of the miniorities shouldn't have to! Never again!
On a side note, please pay attention to the way the movie portrails the Torrah and Judaism, and think about how the Quran is similarly quoted in today's news media regarding to Islamic terrorism.

BRILLIANT! Anyone who doubts the truthfulness of this historical document need to educate themselves a little more. Consider the extract from the English "Rothschilds" movie used In the documentary - a pretty ordiinary 1930's British movie,not meant as Propaganda or anything - yet one that shows the Jews In precisely the same light as In the documentary Itself!! Just because the Jewish people suffered terrible injustices during WW2 doesn't make them a Fine and beautiful race, neither does It absolve the many other Nations who have actively persecuted their respective Jewish populations for,In many instances, hundreds of years (and who use Nazi Germany as their scapegoat for their OWN Guilt!) .Ask yourself - WHY are they so Universally despised?
